line.comment: * returns [TRUE] / [FALSE] depending if a new operation got started
* MultiInvasionStatus : 0 = race has no operation in progress, 1 = preparation phase, [sector] = attack phase
* how far away Battlegroups can get recruited
* factions use BGs from further away when targeting their own dejure sectors
* Rebels can recruit every Battlegroup they got because they can teleport
* we never want more than 4 BGs
* we measure recruit range based on the Battlegroups current destination (added destinations to 'Mayhem.Task.Move')
* but use its current location if there is no destination
* we only allow BGs with minimum strength of roughly an M1 or similar

line.text: ' jumps away from its current destination.'

line.comment: * did we get enough BGs? > BEGIN OPERATION
* sector gets a hidden claim restriction (Mayhem.IsClaimable)
* NPC sectors get claimed immediately so that player gets blocked from conquering and sees it
* create array of all adjacent jumpgates
* an active rallyGate local variable blocks retreat (Mayhem.Squadron.AssessRetreat) and changes fleet behavior (Mayhem.Task.Squadron.BattleGroup)

sval.val: (Debug)
headed to
joined an Op
jumps away from its current destination.
returns [TRUE] / [FALSE] depending if a new operation got started
MultiInvasionStatus : 0 = race has no operation in progress, 1 = preparation phase, [sector] = attack phase
how far away Battlegroups can get recruited
factions use BGs from further away when targeting their own dejure sectors
Rebels can recruit every Battlegroup they got because they can teleport
we never want more than 4 BGs
we measure recruit range based on the Battlegroups current destination (added destinations to 'Mayhem.Task.Move')
but use its current location if there is no destination
we only allow BGs with minimum strength of roughly an M1 or similar
did we get enough BGs? > BEGIN OPERATION
sector gets a hidden claim restriction (Mayhem.IsClaimable)
NPC sectors get claimed immediately so that player gets blocked from conquering and sees it
remember chosen sector
switch to positioning phase
create array of all adjacent jumpgates
find closest adjacent jumpgate
an active rallyGate local variable blocks retreat (Mayhem.Squadron.AssessRetreat) and changes fleet behavior (Mayhem.Task.Squadron.BattleGroup)
we stop any retreating
restart Battlegroup
